00010 #include "aw_WaveSquare.h"
00011 #include "aw_Constant.h"
00012 #include <gtest/gtest.h>
00013 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>

00017 // provide testCase, name
00018 TEST(BasicTests, WaveSquareBasic) {
00019 
00020     //Output outputModel;
00021     // set sampling rate to 1 for testing
00022     boost::shared_ptr<Output> outputModel(new Output(44100, 8));
00023 
00024 
00025     WaveSquare a(outputModel); 
00026 
00027     //Constant *gen1 = new Constant(outputModel); // create a constant generator
00028     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen1(new Constant(outputModel));
00029     gen1->setParameter(gen1->parameterNameValue, 0.0);
00030 
00031     //Constant *gen2 = new Constant(outputModel); // create a constant generator
00032     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen2(new Constant(outputModel));
00033     gen2->setParameter(gen2->parameterNameValue, 1.0);
00034 
00035     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen3(new Constant(outputModel));
00036     gen3->setParameter(gen3->parameterNameValue, 1.0);
00037 
00038 
00039     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameMinimum, gen1);
00040     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameMaximum, gen2);
00041 
00042 //     a.setCyclesPerSecond(1.0); // one cycle per second
00043     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameRate, gen3,
00044                    a.parameterContextNameFrequency);
00045 
00046     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.0), 0);
00047     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.5), 1);
00048     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.55), 1);
00049 
00050 
00051     // gen 4, 5 seconds per cycle
00052     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen4(new Constant(outputModel));
00053     gen4->setParameter(gen4->parameterNameValue, 5.0);
00054 
00055     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameRate, gen4,
00056                    a.parameterContextNamePeriod);
00057     //a.setSecondsPerCycle(5); // 5 seconds per cycle
00058 
00059     // this is now zero
00060     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(0.55), 0);
00061     // this is now more than half
00062     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(2.5), 1);
00063     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(4.99), 1);
00064     EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(5.00), 0);
00065 
00066     // try with optional min/max values
00067     // EXPECT_EQ(a.getValueAtSecond(5.00, -10, 10), -10);
00068 
00069     a.printSample(20, 0);
00070 
00071 
00072     WaveSquare b(outputModel);
00073     b.setParameter(b.parameterNameMinimum, gen1);
00074     b.setParameter(b.parameterNameMaximum, gen2);
00075 
00076     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen5(new Constant(outputModel));
00077     // oscillates at a rate of 4
00078     gen5->setParameter(gen5->parameterNameValue, 0.25);
00079     b.setParameter(b.parameterNameRate, gen5,
00080                    b.parameterContextNameFrequency);
00081 
00082     b.printSample(20, 0);
00083 
00084     WaveSquare c(outputModel);
00085     c.setParameter(c.parameterNameMinimum, gen1);
00086     c.setParameter(c.parameterNameMaximum, gen2);
00087 
00088     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen6(new Constant(outputModel));
00089     // oscillates at a rate of 5
00090     gen6->setParameter(gen6->parameterNameValue, .2);
00091     c.setParameter(c.parameterNameRate, gen6,
00092                    c.parameterContextNameFrequency);
00093     c.printSample(20, 0);
00094 
00095 
00096 // TODO: cannot yet reassign generators
00097 }

00101 // provide testCase, name
00102 TEST(BasicTests, WaveSquareParameterSetting) {
00103 
00104 
00105     boost::shared_ptr<Output> outputModel(new Output(44100, 8));
00106 
00107     WaveSquare a(outputModel); 
00108 
00109     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen1(new Constant(outputModel));
00110     gen1->setParameter(gen1->parameterNameValue, 0.0);
00111 
00112     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen2(new Constant(outputModel));
00113     gen2->setParameter(gen2->parameterNameValue, 1.0);
00114 
00115     boost::shared_ptr<Constant> gen3(new Constant(outputModel));
00116     gen3->setParameter(gen3->parameterNameValue, 5.0);
00117 
00118 
00119     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameMinimum, gen1);
00120     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameMaximum, gen2);
00121 
00122     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameRate, gen3, a.parameterContextNameFrequency);
00123     // test that we have set the right thing
00124     EXPECT_EQ(a.parameterRateContext, a.parameterContextNameFrequency);
00125 
00126     // change to a different context
00127     a.setParameter(a.parameterNameRate, gen3, a.parameterContextNamePeriod);
00128     // test that we have set the right thing
00129     EXPECT_EQ(a.parameterRateContext, a.parameterContextNamePeriod);
00130 
00131 
00132 
00133 }
